T206 HOF’s available Raw. I have provided my opinion on grading. These cards are all guaranteed to grade (can’t guarantee my opinion, but all will receive numerical grade or your money back).  Price includes delivery and is net to me.  If interested, please contact me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] or send a PM.

Baker Good $SOLD
Brown Cubs Good $SOLD

Hi. Tom.  Will take brown
